title: Bug 12398 - Accessibility problems
description: When launching the Help view, I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas (e.g. the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame) before it starts working properly.
OB: Currently, when I launch the Help view, the tab key does not have any effect.
EB: The Help view should be starting in a way that allows immediate navigation via the keyboard.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Launch the Help view on Windows 2000.
2. Try to navigate using the tab key and observe that it does not work as expected.
